__TOC__

 0. ''Availability:''
** Available in <nowiki>[[http://packages.ubuntu.com/dapper/x11/ttf-arphic-uming|universe]]</nowiki>/sid
** Arch: all
 0. ''Rationale:''
** this package can provide better display for chinese font than those package in main now.
** the only existing font that provides characters for Hong Kong, while those in main (<nowiki>[[http://packages.ubuntu.com/dapper/x11/ttf-arphic-bsmi00lp|ttf-arphic-bsmi00lp]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://packages.ubuntu.com/dapper/x11/ttf-arphic-gbsn00lp|ttf-arphic-gbsn00lp]]</nowiki>) can't.
 0. ''Security:'' 
** No CANs
** Just a TrueType font, uncritical
 0. ''Quality assurance:''  
** Maintained by Maintainer: Arne Goetje <arne@linux.org.tw> in debian
